alert.note: Alert for Middlesex; New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 4:23PM EDT until June 02 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western New London County in southern Connecticut... Middlesex County in southern Connecticut... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 422 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Portland, or over Middletown, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Killingworth around 430 PM EDT. Haddam and Lake Pocotopaug--East Hampton around 450 PM EDT. East Haddam around 455 PM EDT. Chester around 505 PM EDT. North Lyme around 525 PM EDT. East Lyme and Old Lyme around 530 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
